version_description: - Bug fixes for HTTP rewrite.
- Bug fixes for link feature of response rewrite rules.
- Bug fixes and various improvements.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.
- Bug fixes and various improvements.

- Supports rewrite of HTTP request body.
- Supports the replay of HTTP request.
- Bug fixes and minor improvements.

- Supports rewrite HTTP(S) request body by using regular expressions.
- Supports TLS 1.3 for TLS based proxy protocols.
- Supports new external proxy protocol trojan, see sample configuration for details.
- Supports JSON viewer with highlighting effects.
- Bug fixes and minor improvements.

- Supports searching for the record of TCP request.
- Supports IPv6 CIDR for filter rules.
- Supports linking to parts of configuration profiles from files in the iCloud Quantumult X folder.
- Optimizes memory usage when user configured a huge number of domain related filter rules.
- Bug fixes and minor improvements.

- Supports 6 field syntax of cron expression.
- Bug fixes.

- Supports creating profile snippets in the app.
- Adds new parameters resource-tag-regex and server-tag-regex for policy.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.

- Supports updating the resource parser manually.
- Bug fixes.

- Improved the HTTP rewrite rule configuration panel. 
- Other minor improvements.

- You can set additional MitM hostnames only for "HTTP Debug" function, when "HTTP Debug" is turned off these hostnames will be ignored.
- Bug fixes and minor improvements.

- Supports local HTTP proxy server.
- Supports local SOCKS5 proxy server.
- Bug fixes and minor improvements.
- Fixes: The TLS 1.3 based proxy may cause a crash.

- Optimizations for iPhone 12 and iPhone 12 Pro
- Supports for Intents Extension
- Improvements for HTTP rewrite and HTTP debug modules
- Bug fixes and other minor improvements

- Fixes some compatible issues on M1 chip Mac.
- Fixes an issue when user incorrectly set the Content-Length header field when composing HTTP request.
- Adds cron task gallery.
- Other minor improvements.

- Optimizes Quantumult X TUN interface.
- Improves network throughputs significantly when Quantumult X (on M1 chip Mac) working as a gateway for other LAN devices.
- Bug fixes.
- Other minor adjustments and improvements.

- Supports HTTP body rewrite with raw data.
- Adds new type of proxy policy "url-latency-benchmark".
- Bug fixes and other minor improvements.

- Supports combination search options of HTTP request URL, request headers, request body, response headers and response body for the HTTP debug records.
- Fixes a display inconsistency issue when switching from or to dark mode in the background.
- Bug fixes and other minor improvements.

- Optimizes HTTP related debug tools for iOS 13, we still recommend you upgrade to iOS 14 for better experience.
- The contents of configuration snippets can be viewed and searched in UI.
- Bug fixes and other minor improvements.

- Adds excluded_ssids option for DNS module (can be configured in the configuraiton file) to exclude customized DNS servers under specific environments.
- Adds support for TLS 1.3 only requests in MitM module.
- Bug fixes and other minor improvements.

- Adds DNS over HTTPS(DoH) support, view sample configuraiton in app for details.
- Bug fixes and other minor improvements.

- Adds option "doh_user_agent" for customized DoH request header field "User-Agent", please view sample configuraiton (section "[general]") in app for details.
- The option "excluded_ssids" can be deployed with the DoH settings, please view sample configuraiton (section "[dns]") in app for details.
- Adds new type of proxy policy "dest-hash".
- Bug fixes and other minor improvements.

- Adds additional params for filter rules to customize outbound interfaces. Please view sample configuraiton in app for details.
- Bug fixes and other minor improvements.
- Fixed a crash that could occur on iPad with keyboard or pencil connected.

- Supports AEAD (Header) for proxy protocol VMess.
- Supports UDP relay (UDP over TCP) for proxy protocol VMess.
- Supports UDP relay (UDP over TCP) for proxy protocol Trojan.
- Supports filter rule with new option via-interface (eg: via-interface=en1) to easily split up traffic on different interfaces (mainly for M1 chip Mac users).
- Bug fixes and other minor improvements.

- Supports WebSocket for proxy protocol Trojan.
- Adds new option alive-checking for url-latency-benchmark policy.
- Adds new option multi-interface-balance for filter rule to load-balance traffic on different network interfaces.
- Bug fixes and other minor improvements.

- Supports multiple DoH (DNS over HTTPS).
- Supports SOCKS5 (over TLS) proxy protocol.
- Supports UDP over TCP transport for UDP packets via shadowsocks protocol (this feature is only compatible with server side deplopyed by ssr Python version).
- Fixes an issue related to HTTP deflate encoding.
- Bug fixes and other minor improvements.
